attributes.title: How To Use The Pandemic Period To Achieve Enlightenment
attributes.description:
27 JULY 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*THE GREAT DELUSION ENERGY RELEASED DURING THIS DELUGE, ITS IMPACT ON YOU; HOW YOU CAN USE ITS IMPACT ON YOU TO ACHIEVE ENLIGHTENMENT.

*I AM NOT EVEN TALKING ABOUT NOT SUFFERING BY THE IMPACT OF THIS DELUSION, I AM TALKING ABOUT USING THIS DELUSION ENERGY TO ACHIEVE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH.

*THIS GREAT DELUGE HAPPENING... I WILL PRECISELY DESCRIBE HOW IT IMPACTS YOU.

*IT IMPACTS YOUR VERY CORE OF WHAT YOU PERCEIVE AS YOU. MANY TIMES, YOU WILL FEEL IRRITATED TO REMEMBER YOUR REGULAR ACTIVITIES; EVEN TO PICK UP A CUP OF COFFEE OR TEA, OR TO GET UP FROM YOUR BED OR GO TO BED! THAT IS TROBHAVA.

*FOR EXAMPLE, IF YOU ARE FEELING LAZY TO GET UP AND DO WORK, IF YOU ARE FEELING IRRITATED TO GET UP AND GO FOR WORK, IT IS UNDERSTANDABLE, BUT WHEN THE DELUSION ENERGY FLOWS YOU WILL FEEL IRRITATED TO EVEN REMEMBER SLEEP. WHAT YOU KNOW AS YOU, EVERYTHING WILL CREATE SUBTLE IRRITATION.

*I WILL DESCRIBE MORE ELABORATE DETAILED WAY, CAPTURING EXACTLY THE IMPACT OF DELUSION ON INDIVIDUALS.

*WHEN YOU TO GO DEEP SLEEP STATE AND FROM THERE TO DREAM STATE AND THEN TO WAKING STATE, YOUR NERVOUS SYSTEM HAS TO BE STRONG ENOUGH TO HANDLE THESE STATES.

*STRESS MEANS INABILITY OF YOUR NERVOUS SYSTEM TO HANDLE WHAT ALL YOU KNOW AS YOU AND YOURS. IT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH QUANTITY OF WHAT YOU ARE DOING.

*IN TAMIL THERE IS A PROVERB THAT THE DOG HAS NO RESPONSIBILITY OR WORK TO BE PERFORMED BUT HAS NO TIME TO STAND.

ALL STRESS IS YOUR INABILITY TO CONNECT TO YOUR VARIOUS STATES OF EXISTENCE AND HAVE CONSISTENCY WITH IT.

*EVERY SITUATION YOU FEEL IRRITATED, ANGRY, DON'T REACT. BE CALM AND LOOK IN WHAT IS MAKING YOU FEEL VIOLATED, IRRITATED; WHAT IS IT THAT IS GETTING YOUR NERVOUS SYSTEM. IT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE EXTERNAL.

*DELUSION IS WORSE THAN DEATH. DEATH IS ONLY A ONE MINUTE HAPPENING. DELUSION DESTROYS YOU WHICH IS A LIKE CONTINUOUS SUFFERING.

THE DECISION YOU MAKE DURING DELUSION DESTROYS YOUR LIFE.

*YOUR HUSBAND, WIFE, DAUGHTER, SON, EVERYONE IN YOUR HOUSE, YOUR EXTERNAL WORLD ARE NOT AT ALL BAD AND THEY ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE SUFFERING YOU ARE GOING THROUGH INSIDE.

*AT LEAST TILL 14TH DEC, DECIDE: “THE DELUSION IS GETTING RELEASED ON THE PLANET. TILL 14TH DEC, NONE OF MY FAMILY OR FRIENDS OR EXTERNAL WORLD IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL EXTERNAL AND INTERNAL HAPPENINGS.”

*ANYTHING THAT LOOKS SO FACTUALLY RIGHT WILL COLLAPSE AFTER 14TH DECEMBER. THE DELUSION WILL BE PREDOMINANT IN THE DECISION MAKING COMPONENT OF YOU. SO THE IDEA ABOUT I AND MINE IS TRAVELING IN A DANGEROUS TERRITORY AND TERRAIN; A TERRITORY THAT IS NOT YOURS AND A TERRAIN WHICH IS DANGEROUS.

*TILL DECEMBER 14TH, EVEN IF YOU EAT AND SLEEP WHOLE DAY, IT IS OK. IF YOU CAN DO SPIRITUAL PRACTICES, IT IS BEST.

*EVERYONE WAKES UP IN MORNING BRAHMA MUHURTA, DOES YOGA, PUJA...THERE ARE GROUPS LIKE THE SAN JOSE GROUP WHO WAKE UP, CALL EACH OTHER, GO ONLINE IN ZOOM AND DO YOGA DURING BRAHMA MUHURTA.

*THE PERSON WHO WAKES YOU UP DURING BRAHMA MUHURTA IS LIKE PARAMASHIVA. IT IS A CALL FROM PARAMASHIVA TO YOU. IT IS LIKE ME TELLING YOU, “DEAR! LET US DO YOGA!” IT IS THIS VOICE THAT COMES TO YOU.

*WAKE UP, DO YOGA. IF YOU CAN, DO THE SPIRITUAL PRACTICES.

*I WILL GIVE YOU A VERY POWERFUL TECHNIQUE: JUST DECIDE TO GO LIQUID DIET. YOUR BODY STARTS EATING ITSELF AND THROWS ANGER, VIOLENCE, TANTRUM... MAKES YOU GO MAD. DURING THAT TIME, SIT AND DO COMPLETION, READ MY MY BHAGAVAD GITA OR LIVING ENLIGHTENMENT BOOK. YOU WILL MASTER YOUR BIOCHEMISTRY - THE CHEMISTRY ON YOUR BIOLOGY. IF YOU MASTER THAT, YOU WILL LIVE SUCH ECSTATIC LIFE.

*IF THE LOAD OF GETTING IRRITATED, VIOLENT, IS TAKEN AWAY FROM YOU, YOU WILL START HAVING THE FEELING CONNECTION WITH POWERFUL COGNITIONS AND HIGHER INTENTIONS INTENSELY.

*I HAVE SEEN THIS WORK 100 PERCENT IN MY GURUS’ LIVES. I HAVE SEEN HOW THEY DEAL WITH THE DISCIPLES.

*ISAKKI SWAMIGAL, I HAVE SEEN HIM PERSONALLY DOING THIS TO THE PEOPLE.

*NIRAHARA SAMYAMA IS NOTHING BUT YOU BECOMING MAHA BHAIRAVA. IT DOESN'T MEAN YOU WILL KILL HUMAN BEINGS AND EAT. YOUR OWN BODY EATING ITSELF AS IT IS, IS MAHABHAIRAVA. DON'T GIVE SOLID FOOD TO THE BODY. ONLY LUBRICATE YOUR SYSTEM WITH LIQUIDS.

READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4155584397862712
